translation.en: [Dib] I used to look up at space
with hope and wonder in my eyes.
Until space looked back.
translation.fr: jusqu'à ce qu'il me regarde à son tour.

translation.en: Invader Zim,
evil, alien soldier of the Irken Empire
translation.fr: un soldat alien malfaisantde l'Empire Irkenien,

translation.en: sent by his diabolical masters, the Almighty Tallest,
translation.fr: envoyé par ses maîtres diaboliques,les Grandeurs Suprêmes,

translation.en: to infiltrate Earth and prepare it for the coming invasion.
translation.fr: pour infiltrer la Terreet la préparer pour l'invasion.

translation.en: Disguised as one of us,
he moved into my neighborhood,
he went to my school,
and with the help of his vile mechanical servants,
translation.fr: et avec l'aide deses vils serviteurs mécaniques,

translation.en: plotted to destroy everything we have,
translation.fr: il prévoyait de détruire tout ce qu'on a,

translation.en: -everything we are. -[helicopter whirring]
-[crowd shouting] -And then...
he vanished.
My name is Dib Membrane.
I'm 12 years old.
And I'm all that stands between Zim and the annihilation of our world.
translation.fr: et je suis tout ce qui se dresse entre Zimet la destruction de notre monde.

translation.en: Prepare your starving, gurgling child-bellies
translation.fr: Préparez vos estomacsaffamés et qui gargouillent

translation.en: for the awesome eventuality of dinner!
Foodio 3000 hopes you love what I have made.
translation.fr: Fourno 3000 espère quevous aimerez ce que j'ai préparé.

translation.en: Also, what is love?
Looks great, Dad. I'm gonna eat that food.
[Professor Membrane] Hold up now, daughter!
Isn't it time your brother joined us?
Oh, man, no.
Since Zim vanished, Dib's been in his room for, like, a million years.
translation.fr: Depuis que Zim a disparu,Dib ne quitte plus sa chambre.

translation.en: I hardly recognize him anymore.
He just sits there in that chair getting grosser...
translation.fr: Il reste assis dans son fauteuil,il devient plus répugnant,

translation.en: smellier.
[Professor Membrane] He sure does, but try to be more understanding.
translation.fr: C'est vrai, mais essaied'être plus compréhensive.

translation.en: Dib's finally letting go of his silly obsession
translation.fr: Dib a enfin abandonnéson obsession absurde

translation.en: with aliens and ghosts and all his other non-scientific nonsense.
translation.fr: pour les aliens, les fantômes et toutesces idioties non scientifiques,

translation.en: And it's not easy for him.
Imagine if you stopped believing in, oh, video games.
translation.fr: Tu imagines si tu arrêtaisde croire aux jeux-vidéos ?

translation.en: Don't even joke about that, Dad.
translation.fr: Ne plaisante pas avec ça, papa.

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Honey, letting go of silly ideas is just part of growing up.
translation.fr: Chérie, abandonner ses idées absurdesest nécessaire pour grandir.

translation.en: Why, as a child, I thought sharks were my friends.
translation.fr: Petit, je croyaisque les requins étaient mes amis.

translation.en: [in ominous voice] I know better now.
[in normal voice] So, try to be more supportive. He's your brother, after all.
translation.fr: Essaie de le soutenir.C'est ton frère.

translation.en: Okay, Dad.
Hey, Dib! Dad says come to dinner!
translation.fr: Hé, Dib !Papa a dit de venir manger !

translation.en: [Dib] You know I can't leave my post, Gaz.
translation.fr: Je peux pas quitter mon poste, Gaz.

translation.en: Just shove the food in here.
Where's the shoving stick? I can't shove without the shoving stick.
translation.fr: Où est le poussoir ?Je peux pas pousser sans le poussoir.

translation.en: [Dib] Zim's still out there, Gaz, so I have to wait
translation.fr: Zim est encore là, Gaz,je dois attendre...

translation.en: and watch.
No one else will. They could never see the truth.
translation.fr: Personne ne le fera. Ils ignorent la vérité.Pourquoi ?

translation.en: Why, though? Brainwashing?
translation.fr: Ils ignorent la vérité.Pourquoi ? Lavage de cerveau ?Contrôle mental ?

translation.en: Mind control?
[whispering] Brain-erasing ghosts?
Nobody believes me now, but I'll make them see.
translation.fr: Personne ne me croit,mais je vais leur montrer.

translation.en: I'll expose Zim to the world, and open humanity's eyes
translation.fr: Je le montrerai au mondeet j'ouvrirai les yeux de l'humanité

translation.en: to the danger they were in all along. [chuckles]
translation.fr: au danger auquel elle étaitexposée tout ce temps.

translation.en: Even Dad, world-famous man of science will say,
translation.fr: Même papa, homme de scienceà la renommée mondiale dira,

translation.en: [in strange accent] "I believe you, Dib. I'm sorry I ever doubted you."
translation.fr: "Je te crois, Dib.Pardon d'avoir douté de toi."

translation.en: That's the worst Dad impression ever,
translation.fr: C'est la pire imitation de papa,

translation.en: but, Dib, let it go.
Zim's been gone a long time,
and as far as you know, he might just be gone for good.
translation.fr: et d'après tes infos,il pourrait être parti pour de bon.

translation.en: I'd be willing to bet that Zim will never, ever...
translation.fr: Je suis prête à parier que jamais Zim...

translation.en: Oh, wait, there he is.
[Dib screeches] It's Zim!
He's back! And he's doing stretches!
translation.fr: Il est de retour et il s'étire !

translation.en: Nobody stretches like that unless they're warming up for evil!
translation.fr: Personne fait çaà moins de se préparer au mal.

translation.en: This is it! The... [grunts]
moment I've been... [grunts and crashes]
waiting for!
[Gaz] What are you doing?
[groans] Gotta get to Zim!
Dib, no. Look at you.
The world's not ready to see what you've become.
translation.fr: Le monde est pas prêtà voir ce que t'es devenu.

translation.en: You're hideous!
The smell!
needs me!
-Take a bath first! -[suit alarm blaring]
Take... [gags]
Take a bath!
No!
Zim!
Yes, it is I, and-- Hmm?
-Oh, wait, sorry. -[flies buzzing]
You'll have to move along, hideous goblin.
translation.fr: Désolé, tu dois partir, gobelin hideux.

translation.en: I'm posing dramatically for when the Dib shows up.
translation.fr: Je prends une pose dramatique pour Dib.

translation.en: -I am Dib. -What?
-Give me a sec here. -[stammers] We know each other.
-[thunder claps] -I've been expecting you, Dib!
I can tell. You set up sprinklers and everything.
translation.fr: Je vois que t'as installédes arroseurs et tout.

translation.en: -[gurgles] -You can't prove anything!
-Anyhow, I-- -Where have you been, Zim?
I've been monitoring your house, the school,
that taco place you love so much.
translation.fr: l'école, ce tacos que t'aimes tant.

translation.en: No, no. GIR loves that place. I think it's dirty.
translation.fr: C'est Gir qui l'aime.Je le trouve sale.

translation.en: -[GIR] I ate a baby there. -He did.
translation.fr: - J'y ai mangé un bébé.- C'est vrai.

translation.en: What have you been up to, Zim?
Phase one of my evil plan, human.
translation.fr: La phase un de monplan diabolique, humain.

translation.en: Phase one.
Computer! Laugh with me! [Computer] I don't want to.
translation.fr: - Ordinateur, ris avec moi.- Je n'ai pas envie.

translation.en: You've been in your house sitting in the toilet all this time?
translation.fr: T'étais chez toi, assis dansles toilettes tout ce temps ?

translation.en: -Yes. -Like, the whole time?
That's right.
Did you have to sit in the toilet?
Do not try to understand the ways of my people, Dib!
translation.fr: N'essaie pas de comprendreles manières de mon peuple, Dib !

translation.en: From the moment my mission began
translation.fr: Dès le début de ma missionsur cette planète horrible,

translation.en: on this horrible planet, you've been there,
translation.fr: Dès le début de ma missionsur cette planète horrible, tu étais là, à me tourmenter commeun "squak" dans mon "shmoopssquizz".

translation.en: haunting my every move like a squak in my shmoopsquizz.
translation.fr: tu étais là, à me tourmenter commeun "squak" dans mon "shmoopssquizz".

translation.en: -A what in your huh? -Uh-huh!
And while the rest of your kind were easily fooled,
translation.fr: Alors que le restede ton espèce se laissait berner,

translation.en: you were able to see through my brilliant disguise.
translation.fr: tu as réussi à percermon génial déguisement.

translation.en: [stammers] Martha!
-[screeches] Eh? -The neighbor boy's an alien!
[stammers] Never mind, Martha. -He's normal. -Okay.
translation.fr: - Oublie, Martha, il est normal.- OK.

translation.en: I knew if I vanished for long enough, you'd just watch and wait,
translation.fr: Je savais que si je disparaissais assezlongtemps, tu attendrais,

translation.en: your neglected body growing smelly
-and useless. -[Dib whimpering]
But that was only Phase One of my evil plan.
translation.fr: Mais ce n'était que la phase unde mon plan diabolique.

translation.en: Well, keep watching, Dookie-Dib. Watch helplessly as I begin...
translation.fr: Continue à regarder, Dib-Caca.Contemple avec impuissance le lancement

translation.en: Phase Two!
I'm switching people's mail around.
translation.fr: - Non !- J'échange les lettres des gens.

translation.en: That's illegal. No!
I'm reading someone's newspaper. I don't pay for a subscription. [laughs]
translation.fr: Je lis le journal de quelqu'un.Je ne paye pas l'abonnement.

translation.en: Nobody reads newspapers anymore, but, no, stop!
translation.fr: Personne ne lit plus le journalmais non, arrête !

translation.en: Minimoose, get in on this mayhem!
That's my mom's pizza sticker.
She is crazy for pizza.
Hey, what... what are you... Hey, that... that's...
Hey, don't... Wait.
Don't! Don't! Don't!
Me! Me! Let me do one.
translation.fr: À moi ! Laisse-moi en faire un.

translation.en: I launched that pug into space.
translation.fr: J'ai lancé ce carlin dans l'espace.

translation.en: -I thought you liked that pig. -[car alarm goes off]
-Why I do that? -What's the matter, human?

translation.en: Why aren't you stopping me?
Can't fight back.
Sat too long.
Chair fused to butt.
More chair than man now.
Humans are such fragile, goopy things.
translation.fr: Les humains sont si fragiles, visqueux.

translation.en: No Irken would ever become a chair.
Wait! Was that Phase Two?

translation.en: Of course it was!
Probably. Uh... You know what? Now I'm not sure.
translation.fr: Probablement.Tu sais quoi ? J'ai un doute.

translation.en: Either way, you're helpless to stop me, Chair-Dib. So long!
translation.fr: Quoi qu'il en soit, tu ne peux rien pourm'arrêter Dib-Fauteuil. À plus !

translation.en: [both] Welcome home, son.
Zim!
Excellent work, me.
All is going according to plan, but there's still much to do, GIR.

translation.en: Yes, sir! [shouts]
[shouts] I bloop you, Schmoopsy!
[chuckles warmly] Floopsy...
Computer?
[Computer groans] What?
Open a connection with the Almighty Tallest,
my leaders and biggest fans.

The Tallest haven't heard from me,

in a very long time.
-They'll be sick with worry. -[GIR squeaks]
translation.fr: Ils seront très inquiets. LES GRANDEURS

translation.en: Hey, remember Invader Zim?
-Who? -Zim. Tiny?
Screamed a lot?
The guy that sends us the donuts?

translation.en: Oh, wait. Zim.
-We hate him! -Yeah, that's him. [chuckles]

we were sending him on a secret mission to Earth,

translation.en: [laughs] Yeah. We're hilarious.
[comms officer] My Tallest, there's an incoming transmission.
Yep, life's been pretty great ever since Zim vanished for good.
translation.fr: La vie est belle depuis que Zim a disparu.

translation.en: Anyhow, send that transmission through.
I wonder who it could ever be. It is I, Zim!

translation.en: My Tallest, you will be overjoyed to know
translation.fr: Mes Grandeurs, sachez que la phase un de monplan ingénieux pour préparer la Terre

translation.fr: sachez que la phase un de monplan ingénieux pour préparer la Terre

translation.fr: sachez que la phase un de monplan ingénieux pour préparer la Terre à votre arrivée a été un succès.

translation.en: Zim, we thought you were dead.
Could a dead Zim do this?

translation.en: [clears throat] Sirs, my Earthly arch-nemesis is now a sad chair,

translation.fr: ce qui me laisse libre d'accomplirla phase la plus diabolique de mon plan,

translation.en: Phase Two,
wherein I, uh...
Computer, put them on hold. Oh, no.
translation.fr: Ordinateur, mise en attente. Oh, non,j'ai oublié ce qu'est la phase deux.

translation.en: I really can't remember what Phase Two is.
translation.fr: Oh, non,j'ai oublié ce qu'est la phase deux.

translation.en: I must have sat in that toilet too long. Think, Zim. Think.
translation.fr: J'ai dû rester trop longtempsaux toilettes. Réfléchis, Zim.

translation.en: We don't care, Zim.
[grunts] Why didn't I write it down?
Wait! Computer,
translation.fr: Pourquoi je l'ai pas écrite...Minute ! Ordinateur ? Repasse les enregistrementsoù je parle de la phase deux.

translation.fr: Ordinateur ? Repasse les enregistrementsoù je parle de la phase deux.

translation.en: [Computer] One recording found.
Would you like me to record any and all mention of Phase Two?

translation.en: No, thank you. Zim forgets nothing.

translation.en: Hmm, besides reminding me how cool I look and sound,

He knows we can still see and hear him, right?

translation.en: I liked when he was dead.
[shouts excitedly] I remember Phase Two!

translation.en: You do? Good work, GIR! Tell me.
You gonna order a million pizzas,

translation.en: And that will never happen!
Silence! I need to think! Just calm down and...

translation.en: -[Computer] Nope. -[screams]
I don't think they heard anything. Yes, they did.
translation.fr: - Je crois qu'ils n'ont rien entendu.- Si.

translation.en: I am Irk's finest Invader.

translation.en: If The Tallest find out I failed to dominate the Earth

who knows what they'll do?
[Almighty Tallest Red] Invader Zim,
you were once our best, most amazing Invader,

translation.en: [Almighty Tallest Red] Control Brains, re-encode.
[Control Brains] Re-encoding.
It is done, My Tallest.
Zim, you will live out

translation.en: -[crowd cheers] -Wait, no, never mind.
GIR, time is of the essence. -The Tallest could be here any day now... -[gasps]
translation.fr: Gir, on a plus le temps.Les Grandeurs sont en route,

translation.en: -Quickly! -[squeals]
Useless dookie!
I need more time to remember Phase Two.

Access The Tallest's computers and retrieve their flight plan.

[Computer in normal accent] I get bored.
P.S. There is insufficient power to access the flight plan.
Then find more power, and be sneaky about it.

Sneaking!
Sneaking!
Sneaking!
Sneaking!
[Computer] Flight plan retrieved.
[Zim] Along this line is every world the Irken Armada plans to conquer,

The Tallest said it was the most important mission of all.

[Computer] Zooming out.
Keep zooming out until you find out how far The Tallest are from Earth.

Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out.
-Hurry it up. -Zooming out.
-Zooming out. -Vámonos!
I must begin Phase Two

translation.en: before Dib gets back into annoying fighting shape.

Hmm, I'm sure it's there,

Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out.
I was in bad shape, then I got too in shape, now I'm back to normal shape.

translation.en: Oh, man, Dib, not the coat.

Now, step aside. I've got a Zim to stop.

These bracelets are just prototypes,

Behold, my boy child!
I can't remember the last time I saw you this excited about science.

Dad, trying to save the Earth from Zim's alien evil is not nonsense.

I've tried to be patient with your unscientific interests...

You saw those sting marks, and you know I eat a lot of honey now.

translation.en: Well, as a man of science, I need proof, and I just haven't seen--

Everything I've collected from my countless battles with Zim,

translation.fr: Le vaisseau de Tak. Un vaisseau alien que j'ai capturéà une alien ennemie de Zim !

[Professor Membrane] It's a fine, fake spaceship you've built there, son, but--

so I'm used to defending our world on my own,

I'm ready for everything you got!

-Uh... -...countdown to Peace Day...

on this beautiful, sunny day.

[narrator] Now, pay close attention to that ham,
'cause it's not the last time you're gonna see that ham in the story.

translation.en: This was a good idea, honey.
Science projects bring families together. How can I help you, son?

translation.en: Uh, maybe later.
You just keep stirring, uh, Dad.

See? It's no use.
-You hate Dib, right? -Affirmative.
But you hate Zim even more. Correct.

translation.en: I see where you're going with this.
Helping us break our dad out of Moopington would--
translation.fr: Libérer notre père de Moopingdis va...

translation.en: Right.
It would make Zim super unhappy.
[Tak's ship] Flawless logic. I will help you.
translation.fr: Logique sans faille. Je vous aiderai.

translation.en: [both] Yes!
-[Tak's ship] On one condition. -What's that?
Disconnect my seat sensors so I don't feel your terrible human butts in me.

translation.en: Deal.
We did it, kids. Hurray for science.
translation.fr: On l'a fait les enfants.Hourra pour la science !

translation.en: Right. Now, about that pudding...
Don't wait up for us, Clembrane!
[both] Yeah!
-[Florpus Hole crackling] -[Tak's ship] Oh. You guys have a deadly Florpus Hole now.

translation.en: -That's new. -[Dib] Yeah.

translation.en: -Let's hurry, ship. -Don't tell me what to do.
translation.fr: - C'est nouveau.- Oui, fais vite, vaisseau. Ne me dis pas quoi faire, mais OK.

translation.en: But okay.
translation.fr: Ne me dis pas quoi faire, mais OK.

translation.en: Now, this is what I like to see, GIR.

translation.en: Pathetic humans fleeing in terror at the sight of Zim!

translation.en: [GIR] Nobody even looking at you.
-[car alarm goes off] -It's a show of respect.
Their stupid eyes can't handle all this.

translation.en: Anyhow, terrible work on the signs, GIR,
worse than I expected.
Aww, thank you.
Did you build me that throne I asked for?
translation.fr: T'as fait le trône que j'ai demandé ?

translation.en: [Zim] Excellent.
Now, to ascend this throne,
translation.fr: Maintenant, je vais monter sur ce trône,

translation.en: and claim my rightful place as...
Hah! But where are the flames?
translation.fr: Mais où sont les flammes ? Je peux pasrégner sans flammes cool

translation.en: I can't rule the world without cool flames shooting up behind me.
translation.fr: Mais où sont les flammes ? Je peux pasrégner sans flammes cool derrière moi.

translation.en: Hit the flames button!
Wait, are those peanuts?
[GIR] Oops.
Try the peanuts button.
[Zim] All right, flames, uh, peanuts,
translation.fr: - Essayez le bouton cacahuètes.- Bien. Flammes ? Cacahuètes ?

translation.en: flames, uh, peanuts?
[screams] The peanuts! [laughing] Oh, whoa, whoa.
The Tallest will be so happy!
[The Tallest moaning] We're so unhappy!
Zim's so close, I can almost smell him.
translation.fr: Zim est si proche que je le sens presque.

translation.en: [comms office] Sirs, really, it's no big deal.
We can just steer around the--
Wait, why steer around the Earth when we can just blow it up?
translation.fr: Pourquoi faire le tour de la Terresi on peut juste la détruire ?

translation.en: Yeah, we're great at blowing stuff up. -[alert blips] -What is that?
translation.fr: Oui, on est doués pour détruire des trucs.C'est quoi ?

translation.en: -[comms officer] It appears to be a-- -Blow it up!
[comms office] But, sirs, there's still the life-destroying space hole to consider.

translation.en: Man, this guy.
[mockingly] "I fly the spaceship, and I sure love steering!"
translation.fr: "Je contrôle le vaisseau spatialet j'adore tourner !"

translation.en: [mockingly] "Ooh, look at me steering all over the place.
Look at me steering with my wittle steering hands."
I like that we're funny.
-[music stops] -[both] Hey!
[Tak's ship] Your noises are bad. Also, we're here.
translation.fr: - Hé !- Vos sons sont nuls. Et on est arrivés.

translation.en: Moo-Ping 10,
prison to the galaxy's most infamous criminals.
translation.fr: Prison pour les pirescriminels de la galaxie.

translation.en: Okay, their defenses are about to go down.
How do you know?
[Tak's ship] Just get ready.
All right, now what?
[Tak's ship] I'll go cause a diversion and come back when you've found your dog.
translation.fr: Je fais diversion et je reviensquand vous aurez le chien.

translation.en: -Our dad. -Whatever.
That's our diversion. You ready?
I was born ready, Gaz. This spy coat isn't just to look cool.
translation.fr: Toujours prêt, Gaz. Le manteau,c'est pas que pour l'air cool.

translation.en: -[grunts] -[Dib] Now we'll never find Dad!
normally, you crying on the floor is hilarious, but come on.
translation.fr: Normalement, te voir pleurerau sol c'est hilarant, mais allez.

translation.en: It's all my fault, Gaz. [groans]
translation.fr: Tout est de ma faute, Gaz.

translation.en: Why aren't you saying I told you so?
'Cause making fun of you is no fun when you're this sad.
translation.fr: Me moquer de toi n'estpas drôle quand t'es si triste.

translation.en: You're my brother, man.
I only torment you because I know you can handle it.
translation.fr: Je te tourmente carje sais que tu le supportes.

translation.en: I've done way worse than throwing you in a space prison.
translation.fr: J'ai fait pire que t'envoyerdans une prison spatiale.

translation.en: This is nothing. Get up!
I was supposed to save the world, Gaz, not help Zim destroy it.
translation.fr: Je devais sauver le monde, Gaz,pas aider Zim à le détruire.

translation.en: I was gonna show people the truth.
translation.fr: Je devais montrer la vérité aux gens.

translation.en: I knew if they saw something amazing,
translation.fr: Je savais ques'ils voyaient un truc génial,

translation.en: even if it was horrible, like Zim, people would just wake up,
translation.fr: même si c'était horrible, comme Zim,les gens se réveilleraient,

translation.en: and stop obsessing over all the little things
and see that there was something bigger out there,
translation.fr: et verraient qu'il y a quelquechose de plus grand.

translation.en: something to unite against.
Instead of fighting each other, the world would know there was--
translation.fr: au lieu de nous battre entre nous,le monde aurait su qu'il y avait...

translation.en: [Gaz] Hey, Dib! Shut up and look!
-Dad! -[Professor Membrane] Son!
-[aliens] Aww! -[Professor Membrane] I didn't want to interrupt your lovely, imaginary speech.
translation.fr: Je voulais pas interrompreton discours imaginaire.

translation.en: Imaginary?
Well, the last thing I remember was something hitting me on the head
translation.fr: Je me souviens juste qu'un trucm'a frappé sur la tête

translation.en: and starting this incredible hallucination.
No, this is all really happening.
Zim used your bracelets to teleport the Earth
translation.fr: Zim a utilisé tes bracelets pour téléporter la Terreailleurs dans l'univers.

translation.en: to another part of the universe!
translation.fr: pour téléporter la Terreailleurs dans l'univers.

translation.en: Do you know how?
[alien] Uh, he's not gonna know how.
[Professor Membrane] Son, the Membracelet is just for running apps
translation.fr: Le Membracelet ne sertqu'à lancer des applis et faire la paix

translation.en: and world peace, but, oh, theoretically...

translation.en: -[aliens gasp] -...one could use it to, say,
translation.fr: mais, en théorie, quelqu'unpourrait l'utiliser pour, disons,

translation.en: create a galactic star gate of sorts, yes.
translation.fr: créer une sorte de porte des étoiles, oui.

translation.en: What?
That's crazy, yo.
Well, we knew it was possible,
but only with the addition of a purely theoretical
alien horror blob energized by a purely theoretical
translation.fr: hypothétique alien difforme, stimulé par un hypothétique petitélan violet de l'espace.

translation.en: -tiny purple space moose. -[aliens chuckling]
translation.fr: stimulé par un hypothétique petitélan violet de l'espace.

translation.en: But all those things don't exist, so we didn't worry about it.
translation.fr: Mais ça n'existe pas,donc on s'est pas inquiété.

translation.en: Minimoose!
Dad, if you had that purple space moose, could you use it to teleport the Earth
translation.fr: Papa, avec cet élan de l'espace,tu pourrais ramener la Terre

translation.en: back where it belongs?
Theoretically, mmm-hmm.
Too bad we're in prison.
[Tak's ship] Three human butts is too many, so I brought this.
translation.fr: Trois fessiers humains c'est trop,j'ai pris ça.

translation.en: Hop in.
[Professor Membrane] This is all so real!
translation.fr: - C'est si réaliste.- Pas une hallucination.

translation.en: -Not a hallucination. -[Gaz] Shotgun!
translation.fr: - C'est si réaliste.- Pas une hallucination. Je monte devant.

translation.en: -[aliens cheering] -[alien] See you later!
Only enough room in there for you guys, I guess.
translation.fr: Y a juste assez de place pour vous,j'imagine.

translation.en: [Tak's ship] Hang on to your disgusting butts!
What's with you and butts?

translation.en: [laughs maniacally] Okay, okay. Okay, enough running and screaming. Let's mix it up a bit.
translation.fr: OK ! OK, arrêtez de courir et de hurler,changeons un peu !

translation.en: Maybe bow down before me or something.
Hmm, leaping is good.
[Professor Membrane] Well, that was very convincing.
Because it's real, Dad!
[Professor Membrane] How could anything that horrifying be real?
translation.fr: Comment ce truc terrifiantpourrait être réel ?

translation.en: Dad, the Earth's minutes away from being destroyed!
Why are you laughing?
[Professor Membrane] Minimoose is a funny name.
[Tak's ship] Normally, I'd say "Don't touch me," but maybe a little help?

translation.en: -[alarms blaring] -[Tak's ship] This isn't good.
Gaz!
[Professor Membrane] Marvelous!
I truly believe I'm falling to a hideous death!

translation.en: Hang on, Dad!
Don't let go!
[Professor Membrane] Don't worry. None of this is real.
translation.fr: T'inquiète pas.Rien de tout ceci n'est réel.

translation.en: -I'll prove everything to you. -[cat meows]
Just hang on!
You'll be proud of me!
[Professor Membrane] Son, you don't have to prove anything.

translation.en: I'm always proud of you.
translation.fr: Je suis toujours fier de toi.

translation.en: Dad!
[Zim] I did it, GIR.
The humans cower in fear before my superior Irken might,
translation.fr: Les humains reculent face àma puissance irkenienne supérieure,

translation.en: and just in time.
Is that The Tallest I see approa--

translation.en: Dib?
You...
Give me the moose.
Zim, that moose is the only thing
translation.fr: Zim ! L'élan est la seule chose qui peutsauver la Terre du Florpus.

translation.en: that can save Earth from your Florpus!
translation.fr: L'élan est la seule chose qui peutsauver la Terre du Florpus.

translation.en: [grunts] Get your own moose, human! -This one's mine! -[squeaks]
translation.fr: Trouve-toi ton élan, humain !C'est le mien !

translation.en: Hah, I think you're cool too, Minimoose.
translation.fr: Je te trouve cool aussi, Mini-élan !

translation.en: [Dib] Stop! We're running out of time!
translation.fr: Arrête ! On a plus le temps !

translation.en: [Zim] You're ugly when you lie, Dib!

translation.en: [Dib] I'm not lying! [Zim] Then why are you ugly?
translation.fr: - Je mens pas.- Alors pourquoi t'es moche ?

translation.en: -Give me the moose. -No! -Give me the moose. -No! -Give me the moose. -No!
[Zim] I liked you better when you were a chair!
translation.fr: Je te préférais quand t'étais un fauteuil.

translation.en: And I liked you better when you were a toilet!
translation.fr: Moi je te préféraisquand t'étais des toilettes.

translation.en: I was not a toilet!
[Dib grunting] Leprechaun cat, no--
I was hiding in the toilet.
translation.fr: Je me cachais dans des toilettes.

translation.en: Zim!
No!
Well, he's dead.
GIR, all this evil is doing a number on my throat.

translation.en: Fetch me a soothing lozenge!

translation.en: Dad!
[Professor Membrane] Why are you wearing those shirts?
I never hired any of you!
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais engagéaucun d'entre vous.

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Don't worry, son.
I've got your back.
Spencer! Devon!
-Maria! -[Professor Membrane] Come on!
Lawrence!
No!
GIR, avenge your robot brothers and Maria.
translation.fr: Gir ! Venge tes frères robots !Et Maria.

translation.en: Yes, my master!
You're terrible, GIR!
It's over, Zim.
-[sips] -Oh, it is?
Well, now I'm sad. Wait! Have you forgotten?

translation.en: You're grounded!
-And you, get away from my son! -[choking]
translation.fr: Et toi, écarte-toi de mon fils !

translation.en: -[babbles] -...what's happening? -[babbles] -What is this thing?
translation.fr: Que se passe-t-il ?C'est quoi ce truc ?

translation.en: -He's you, Dad. -[Professor Membrane] What?
translation.fr: Toi, papa. - Quoi ?- Qui est moi ? Je suis moi. Mais lui ?

translation.en: Who's me, son? I'm me.
translation.fr: - Quoi ?- Qui est moi ? Je suis moi. Mais lui ?

translation.en: But who's that? Pudding break.
translation.fr: - Quoi ?- Qui est moi ? Je suis moi. Mais lui ? Pause pudding.

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] I'm very confused right now.
[Zim] So, it has been revealed.
You've discovered the clone is not actually
translation.fr: Tu as découvertque le clone n'est en fait pas

translation.en: your real father!
You told me he wasn't my real father.
translation.fr: Tu m'as dit qu'il était pas mon père.

translation.en: Pudding break over. [Professor Membrane] Oh, this feels so real!
translation.fr: - Pause pudding terminée.- C'est si réel !

translation.en: -We need that moose, Dad! -[crashes in distance]
translation.fr: Il nous faut cet élan, papa !

translation.en: [laughs] Nothing's uglier than moose jealousy, Dib.
translation.fr: Y a rien de plus moche quela jalousie, Dib. Que...

translation.en: Ooh, what the... Where did--
translation.fr: Y a rien de plus moche quela jalousie, Dib. Que... Où t'as...

translation.en: [Tak's ship] Yours is the worst... [glitching] butt of them... butt of them all, Zim.
translation.fr: Tu as le pire de tousles f-f-fessiers, Zim.

translation.en: Dib!
Do you still have that ham I gave you?
translation.fr: Tu as toujours le jambonque je t'ai donné ?

translation.en: Of course!
The ham!
[narrator] See? There's that ham again.
[Professor Membrane] Great work, honey, but...
Oops.
Honey, fighting doodn't solve anything.
translation.fr: Chérie ? La violence ne résout rien !

translation.en: Also, I found this little moose thing. Look at it. Isn't it funny?
translation.fr: Aussi, j'ai trouvé ce petit élan.Regardez ! Il est pas marrant ?

translation.en: I command you to return the moose
translation.fr: Je t'ordonne de me rendre l'élan,

translation.en: and destroy the Membrane family!
translation.fr: et de détruire la famille Membrane.

translation.en: But... they my family.
And that guy, it's like looking into a mirror.
translation.fr: Et ce gars, c'est commesi je me regardais dans un miroir.

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Oh, I don't know about-- [grunts angrily] I should've known you'd fail me!
translation.fr: - Oh, je sais pas...- J'aurais dû savoir que tu me décevrais.

translation.en: You couldn't even learn to make pudding the right way.
translation.fr: Tu sais même pas fairele pudding correctement.

translation.en: Hey! You leave Clembrane alone!
Yeah! [in British accent] It's the best pudding I've ever had in my life.
translation.fr: Oui, c'est le meilleurpudding que j'ai jamais mangé.

translation.en: Excellent. Now, just...
-No! -[squeals]
[gasps] It's happening!
Use the moose!
[Professor Membrane] Uh, right. Use the moose.
Um, okay.
Everyone, hold hands again.
translation.fr: Que tout le monde se redonne la main !

translation.en: [Gaz in normal accent] Yeah! Your lives depend on it!
Okay! Hold my hand.
No way! Be serious!
translation.fr: Hors de question ! Un peu de sérieux.Allez, tout le monde.

translation.en: Now, come on, everyone. Faster!
translation.fr: Hors de question ! Un peu de sérieux.Allez, tout le monde. Plus vite !

translation.en: I did my best.
It's no use, Dib.
You've lost. The Irken Armada is already here.
translation.fr: Tu as perdu.L'Armada irkenienne est déjà là.

translation.en: Forward cannons now at full power.
[Professor Membrane] Almost have it.
Dad, hurry!
We're entering the Florpus!
[Zim] Zim has won!
No pressure, Dad,
[Professor Membrane] Cut me some slack! This is my first moose!
translation.fr: Lâche-moi un peu.C'est mon premier élan !

translation.en: Relax. [in distorted voice] It's just realities colliding like my computer said.
translation.fr: Du calme. C'est juste le choc des réalitésdont parlait mon ordinateur.

translation.en: [in distorted voice] And tearing Earth apart, you moron!
translation.fr: Et qui détruit la Terre, imbécile !

translation.en: [stammers] Oh, no.
[Professor Membrane] I've got it!
My Tallest, the Earth...
translation.fr: Mes Grandeurs ? La Terre ? Elle a disparu.

translation.en: It's gone.
That's great news.
-Crisis averted. -Hurray!
translation.fr: Crise évitée. Hourra ! Plus besoin de tourner.

translation.en: Now we don't have to turn.
[comms officer] Sirs, there's still the horrifying space hole straight ahead.
translation.fr: Messieurs, il reste le trou spatialterrifiant droit devant.

translation.en: [Almighty Tallest Purple] Why are you so negative?
[The Tallest] Yay! Whoo-hoo!
-[Almighty Tallest Purple] Yeah-- -[electricity buzzes]
[Professor Membrane] Now, prepare your eating faces
translation.fr: Maintenant, préparez vos tête qui ont faim...

translation.en: for incalculable nutrition!
Good work, Foodio.
Thank you, Gazlene.
I hope you can taste the love simulation I made it with.
translation.fr: J'espère que vous sentirez l'amouravec lequel j'ai cuisiné.

translation.en: -[heavy footsteps approach] -[Clembrane] Just one final ingwedient.
[laughs] Family and pudding and science and wobots and stuff.
-So, does he live here now or what? -[Gaz grunts]
translation.fr: Donc, il vit avec nous ou quoi ?

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] I'm still very confused. -[laughs] -[chuckles]
translation.fr: - Je suis toujours très confus.- Oui.

translation.en: Enjoying your losers' meal, eh, Dib?
translation.fr: Tu profites du plat du perdant, Dib ?

translation.en: "Losers"? Your plan failed.
Did it, Dib? Did it?
What if I told you my plan all along
translation.fr: Et si je te disais que mon plandepuis le début était de voler

translation.en: was to steal this whatever-it-is?
translation.fr: Et si je te disais que mon plandepuis le début était de voler ceci, quoi que ce soit !

translation.en: Phase Two. It was Phase Two all along.
Is that the ceramic clown puppy from our living room?
translation.fr: C'est le chiot clownen céramique de notre salon ?

translation.en: Who's laughing now, Dib?
translation.fr: Qui est-ce qui rit maintenant, Dib ?

translation.en: I am, see? [laughing]
[Professor Membrane] Why didn't you invite your little green friend in for dinner, son?
translation.fr: Pourquoi t'as pas invité toncopain vert à manger, fils ?

translation.en: Dad, that was Zim, the alien who almost destroyed the world, remember?
translation.fr: Papa ! C'était Zim, l'alien qui a presquedétruit le monde, tu te souviens ?

translation.en: [Professor Membrane] Son, of course I remember.
translation.fr: Fils, bien sûr que je m'en souviens.

translation.en: I remember getting hit on the head and dreaming up all that crazy stuff.
translation.fr: J'ai reçu un coup sur latête et j'ai rêvé de tous ces trucs fous.

translation.en: What?
What's happening? Is everything over?
translation.fr: - Que se passe-t-il ? Tout est fini ?- Oui, Gir.

translation.en: Yes, GIR, I'm just waiting for The Tallest
translation.fr: - Que se passe-t-il ? Tout est fini ?- Oui, Gir. J'attends que les Grandeurs répondent,

translation.en: to answer this call so I can tell them all about my success.
translation.fr: J'attends que les Grandeurs répondent, pour leur parler de mon succès.

translation.en: Did we win? Did we win? Did we win? Did we win?
Did we win? Did we win? Did we win? Did we win? Did we win? Did we win?
-[inhales] -[screams] Did we win?
Of course. Zim always wins...
No thanks to you working with the enemy.
translation.fr: Pas grâce à toi qui passe à l'ennemi.

translation.en: -[Minimoose squeaks] -Heh, good one, Minimoose. -I can't stay mad at you. -[screen buzzes]
translation.fr: Ha, bien, Mini-élan.Je peux pas t'en vouloir.

translation.en: Ah, here we go.
My Tallest, I am pleased to report
translation.fr: Mes Grandeurs, ravi de vousdire que mon plan a marché

translation.en: my plan was a success and I now have Dib's puppy clown thing,
translation.fr: Mes Grandeurs, ravi de vousdire que mon plan a marché et que j'ai maintenantle chiot clown de Dib,

translation.en: which was my plan all along.
Does this please you?
That sounded like a yes to me.
translation.fr: Je prends ça pour un oui.

translation.en: Yay! I missed you so much!
